1.5.name: wordpress/dj-email-publish
1.5.description:
When you publish a new post, this plugins will send the post to your other blogs (such as msn spaces) via email..

  • 1.7.2 (2013.07.19) Just tested with Wordpress 3.5. Nothing changed ^^
  • 1.7.1 (2010.07.31) Just tested with Wordpress 3.0
  • 1.7 (2009.05.19) SMTP option supported.
  • 1.6.1 (2008.12.21) PHPMail->CharSet is set to "utf-8".
  • 1.6 (2008.12.17) Had been tested with Wordpress 2.7. If the post is set as "password protected", the post will not be sent.
